title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 4-2.5 - Legionella culture analysis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 4-2.5 - Legionella culture analysis

State Regulations

All Legionella culture analyses must be performed by a laboratory that is approved to perform such analysis by the New York State Environmental Laboratory Approval Program (ELAP). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
4-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
